org.springframework.integration.smpp.util

Class CurrentMethodExposingMethodInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.smpp.util.CurrentMethodExposingMethodInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.aopalliance.aop.Advice, org.aopalliance.intercept.Interceptor, org.aopalliance.intercept.MethodInterceptor

    public class CurrentMethodExposingMethodInterceptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.aopalliance.intercept.MethodInterceptor
    Simple method interceptor that does nothing but store the currently executing method and make it available for the duration of the invoked method, so that any class may introspect the currently running method without setting up a custom MethodInterceptor like this one.

    In a sense, this is like JavaScript's method arity feature.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Josh Long
